Great torrent, only problems are a few low video quality episodes in the first season, and that in the third season some of the episodes are mis-titled. Ep11 is actually the finale, and 12/13 are 5/6, respectively. Try to watch them in order, or you may get confused :)

Here's a list of mis-named episodes in season 3:
06 should be 08
07 should be 09
08 should be 10
09 should be 11
10 should be 12
11 should be 13
12 should be 06
13 should be 07

For all the idiots who can't do a little research and jump to insulting the uploader about the episode order.  Taken from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Arrested_Development_episodes#Season_1_.282003.E2.80.932004.29

"there are three instances where Fox aired the episodes out of chronological order. "Charity Drive" was aired before "Visiting Ours", but chronologically takes place after it; "In God We Trust" was produced and aired before "My Mother, the Car", but appears after it on the DVD; and "Missing Kitty" was aired after the two-part episode "Altar Egos" and "Justice Is Blind", but appears before them on the DVD."
Season 2 is in the wrong order. I don't understand why you would do that other than to be annoying. Wouldn't bother downloading this, there are better torrents.
